title: Hitchcock Movie Trivia
description: The Master of Suspense left us spellbound for decades. How well do you know Alfred Hitchcock's greatest films?

questions.question: In 'Rear Window' (1954), Jimmy Stewart's character is confined to his apartment because of what?
Which 1958 Hitchcock film stars Jimmy Stewart as a detective with a fear of heights?
options: The Man Who Knew Too Much

questions.question: In 'North by Northwest' (1959), Cary Grant is chased by a crop duster plane in which U.S. state?
Alfred Hitchcock was famous for making a brief appearance in most of his films. What is this called?
In 'The Birds' (1963), which coastal California town is terrorized by bird attacks?
Who starred as the glamorous jewel thief in 'To Catch a Thief' (1955)?
Which Hitchcock film takes place entirely in a single apartment and was filmed to look like one continuous shot?
In 'Psycho' (1960), what is the name of the roadside motel where the famous shower scene occurs?
Which 1951 Hitchcock film features two strangers who agree to 'exchange' murders on a train?
Ingrid Bergman starred alongside Cary Grant in which 1946 Hitchcock thriller set in South America?
In 'The Man Who Knew Too Much' (1956), Doris Day sang which song that became a number-one hit?
Which landmark serves as the climactic setting for the chase scene in 'North by Northwest'?
Hitchcock's 'Dial M for Murder' (1954) was originally shown in which special film format?
Which blonde actress starred in three Hitchcock films: 'Dial M for Murder,' 'Rear Window,' and 'To Catch a Thief'?
Alfred Hitchcock never won the Academy Award for Best Director despite being nominated five times. True or false?
options: False -- he won once for Rebecca
False -- he won once for Psycho
